channel.title: Yeah-Right on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Yeah-Right on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: November 12, 2022 11:14
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Unless ‘Avoid Tolls’ is checked in route options, G Maps seems to nudge you to take toll roads even if the toll-free route gets you to your destination several minutes earlier. Hmm, wonder why? You’re welcome, G!
